name: Qualium
tagline: Agencia de inbound marketing y publicidad digital
description: In Qualium we are a multidisciplinary team of specialized professionals willing to innovate and take any risk. We break rules, create trends and generate emotions with every project we do. We offer a unique service model for consulting in digital marketing, design, public relations and advertising.
